step1.title: Portfolio select
step1.text: The portfolio you have selected is displayed here. Orders will be made on behalf of the portfolio

step2.title: Add widget
step2.text: Here you can add a new widget

step3.title: New order
step3.text: Create a new order. You can also create an order by clicking on the line in the orderbook

step4.title: Remove
step4.text: Removes the widget from the dashboard. You can add it again via the panel above

step6.title: Link to active
step6.text: If the lock is closed, then the widget monitors the active instrument and/or portfolio and changes when it changes

step7.title: Settings
step7.text: Here you can change the settings of a widget
